use_cases_desc: Interacting with a large display: graphics editor, picture viewer, and map exploration
evaluation: User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment); User study (qualitative)
contribution_desc: This paper presents the concept of a touch-enabled sleeve device on the arm for interacting with a large public display as well as a working prototype based on a smartphone.
interaction_techniques: UI distribution; Data transfer/sharing; Data exploration; Cross-device task chaining
